definition: to be worthy of/to deserve to be called/to prove oneself to be
(negative prefix)/not/no
ashamed
old variant of 愧[kui4]
not ashamed to learn from subordinates (idiom)
no shame, no subterfuge (idiom); just and honorable/upright and above board

sentences.english: Oho, you are a true partner.
Such majestic demeanor as befits a nephew of mine.
sentences.chinese: 气势如虹，不愧是朕的侄儿。

sentences.english: Good strong match, worthily for union armed force first soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 好强劲的对手，不愧为联合军第一战士。

sentences.english: He is very regular in his walks, is my son.
sentences.chinese: 他可不愧是我儿子，散步是很有规律的。

sentences.english: She is a real accountant who even keeps a detailed household ledger.
sentences.chinese: 她不愧是搞财务的，家庭分类账记得清楚详细。

sentences.english: Qianyan Temple is really a treasure place with the talent of the mountains and water.
sentences.chinese: 嵌岩寺，不愧是一处汲天地之灵气的风水宝地。

sentences.english: Beijing is an international city and deserves the great honor that was bestowed on it.
sentences.chinese: 北京是一座国际大都市，不愧其天赐的伟大荣耀。

sentences.english: Wherefore by departing manfully out of this life, I shall shew myself worthy of my old age.
sentences.chinese: 所以现在，我若是勇敢舍生，我不愧有此高龄。

sentences.english: Indeed, one worthy of higher animals.
sentences.chinese: 的确，人不愧为高等动物。

sentences.english: Depends on the soil is indeed proud of the businessmen in Fujian.
sentences.chinese: 赖金土不愧是福建商人的骄傲。

sentences.english: Be worth of the best environment city of investment.
sentences.chinese: 不愧为中国最佳投资环境城市的称号。

sentences.english: You deserve it so we will give you your new smart home as a present.
sentences.chinese: 你们不愧是我们会给你新做智能家居的缘故。

sentences.english: Jiuzhaigou's scenery is worthy of Shu and landscape a new volume.
sentences.chinese: 九寨沟的风光不愧是蜀中又一幅新的山水画卷。

sentences.english: This book is a monumental work worthy of China's new cultural movement.
sentences.chinese: 这部著作不愧为中国新文化运动的丰碑。

sentences.english: Facts have proved that, AB Corporation is the brave teacher who worthily fights a hard battle friendly.
sentences.chinese: 事实证明，AB公司不愧是善打硬仗的骁勇之师。

definition: lit. name is not in vain (idiom); a fully justified reputation/enjoys a well-deserved reputation
really/sure enough/as expected/if indeed
ashamed
old variant of 愧[kui4]
no wonder!/so that's why!
(it's) no wonder (that...)/(it's) not surprising (that)
really/as expected/sure enough/if indeed.../if it's really...
to exclaim in admiration
not just in name only, but also in reality (idiom)
can be rated as/can be said to be
ashamed of being inferior (idiom)/to feel inferior to others
to admire
to consider oneself as being not as good as the others
fully deserving, without any reservations (idiom); entirely worthy (of a title, honor etc)
to be known as/to be nicknamed/to be purportedly/to claim (often exaggeratedly or falsely)
to take seriously/serious/No joking, really!
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
